post_title: FS: Lot of Low to Mid-Grade T206 w/ HOFers and E. Collins Double Name
post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale. Nice assortment with some low grade and some nicer mid-grade examples.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards from list for easier reading):

Phillippe (Tolstoi, very tough low population combo) - $250

Will take these

Abbaticchio (blue sleeves) - $65
Berger (Polar Bear) - $50
Leach (portrait) - $50


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

PM sent on purchasing:
Easterly @30
Stovall (portrait) @30

PM sent

Bump for a major update to the list with many new cards added.  Thanks for looking!

Marc,
